Package org.appkit.util

Various utility-functions

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Naming.QueryMatcher<E>  
ParamSupplier<K,V>  
Texts.CustomTranlation Implement this to make a control translatable.
Throttle A throttle to limit expensive calls triggered by often-recurring events.
Throttle.Supplier  
Ticker A ticker that notifies stuff.
Ticker.Supplier  
Ticker.TickReceiver  
 

Class Summary
LoggingRunnable A Runnable that logs all RuntimeExceptions.
Naming<E> This serves as a generic dictionary which allows objects to be retrieved using any a combination of fully-customizable query syntax using a string and a specified class.
ResourceStreamSupplier A ParamSupplier which returns an InputStream by loading a file from resources.
ResourceStringSupplier A ParamSupplier which returns a String by loading a file from resources.
SmartExecutor An Executor that provides commonly-used methods.
SWTSyncedRunnable Wrapper for a Runnable that will execute it in the given Display's thread.
SWTSyncedTickReceiver Wrapper for a TickReceiver that will execute it in the given Display's thread.
Texts Serves as a store for i18n-texts and provides methods for working with them.
 

Package org.appkit.util Description

Various utility-functions
